alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Washington Cascades; Kittitas Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:37PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kittitas County through 600 PM PDT... At 537 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Liberty, or 10 miles east of Cle Elum, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cle Elum, Liberty and Mission Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy, persistent rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Washington Cascades; Kittitas Valley
